Constructor Detail

Discoverer

public Discoverer(java.net.InetAddress broadcastAddress,
                  java.lang.String yourNetMacAddress,
                  int socketPort)
           throws java.net.SocketException
It is an adventurer obj. Initialize it and use scan function to find any Common on the current net.

Parameters:
broadcastAddress - is you ip broadcast address
yourNetMacAddress - is your net-mac-address
socketPort - is the discoverer socketPort where it listen
Throws:
java.net.SocketException - Something goes wrong in the init of the mainSocket. Are you connected ?
See Also:
scan(Class, eu.areamobile.apis.hw.pics.ijones.Discoverer.OnScanResponseListener)

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(GenericDevice genericDevice,
                        Discoverer.OnResponseListener listener)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Send a broadcast UDP packet containing a request for service to announce themselves. It use the inner mainSocket, created by Discoverer.

Parameters:
genericDevice - At who do you want to send?
listener - return from the stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - something goes wrong
See Also:
HWJSonIOSpecs

sendMessageToAll

public void sendMessageToAll(Operation operation)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Send a broadcast UDP packet to-all containing a request for service to announce themselves. It use the inner mainSocket, created by Discoverer.

Parameters:
operation - the operation you'd like to send throw the mainSocket
Throws:
java.io.IOException - something goes wrong

getSignature

public java.lang.String getSignature(java.lang.String challenge)
                              throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Calculate the signature we need to send with the request. It is a string containing the hex md5sum of the challenge and remote key.

Parameters:
challenge - to compare
Returns:
signature string
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
